channel.title: Entropee
channel.description: Entropee is an AI startup company, focusing on unsupervised learning and deep learning.

item.title: Welcome to Entropee!
item.description:
Welcome to Entropee!

Entropee is founded in 2016 to commercialize and accelerate the development of unsupervised learning and deep learning. We focus on developing learning algorithms that can learn from data autonomously without human in the loop.

In a series of blog posts, we will to blog about our work and some fun stuff. The topics will include unsupervised learning, deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing, etc. We hope you will enjoy them.

You can subscribe via RSS to receive lastest updates.
